.`` I genuinely on an hourly basis want to teach myself that this is what can happen when you're successful is that you start to believe your own hype,'' he explained. Then you start living in this bubble, which is your world, and you start to believe that that's the only world that exists. Which is why most successful people screw it up for themselves normally within two, three, five, ten years. Because they stop listening. The biggest failures I've had were at a time when I believed my own hype. Mike Pence stepped down from his position as the No. 3 leader among U.S. House Republicans after winning re-election in November, and has been receiving support from social conservatives to make a presidential run. know, there's a lot of talk these days around here about where members of Congress are going to sit during the State of the Union address,'' Indiana Republican Mike Pence said recently on the House floor.
